column2: Southern Nevada Culinary and Bartenders Pension Plan
column3: Hotel Employees Restaurant Employees Pension Plan (Northwest/Seattle)
column4: San Francisco Culinary, Bartenders and Service Employees Pension Plan
column6: Sacramento Independent Hotel, Restaurant and Tavern Employees Pension Plan

column2: First day contributions are made/required, provided 300 Hours of Service are worked in that Plan Year.
column3: Automatic on first day contributions are made/required (subject to 300 Hours of Service requirement).
column4: First of the month following completion of the third month of employer contributions made within a Plan Year.
column5: On the date credited with 300 Hours of Service in the Plan.
column6: Earlier of: 1st of month after 5 months of contributions in a Plan Year OR June 1/Dec 1 following 1,000 hours in 12 months.

column2:
**5 Years:** If worked at least one covered hour on/after Jan 1, 1997.
**10 Years:** If no work after 1996.
column3:
**5 Years:** If worked ≥1 hour on/after Jan 1, 1997 (and no permanent break).
**10 Years:** If worked ≥1 hour on/after Jan 1, 1994.
**Vesting Service:** 1,000 hours = 1 year; partial credit for 400-999 hours.
column4:
**5 Years:** If worked ≥1 hour on/after April 1, 1998.
**10 Years:** Otherwise.
**Vesting Service:** Based on monthly contributions (6+ months = 1 year) or 1,000 hours.
column5:
**5 Years:** For service on/after Jan 1, 1996.
**10 Years:** For service prior to Jan 1, 1996.
**Vesting Service:** 1,000 hours = 1 year.
column6: **5 Years:** 1,000 hours = 1 year credit; 500 hours = 0.5 credit.

column2: Age 62 with 5 years of Pension Credit (if worked on/after Jan 1, 1997).
column3: Age 65 with 5 years of service (or 5th anniversary of participation).
column4: Age 65 (or 5th anniversary of participation if later, applicable to service on/after April 1, 1988).
column5: Later of Age 65 or 5th anniversary of participation (after Jan 1, 1988).
column6: Age 65 and 5 years of vesting service.

column2:
**Age 55-61** with 5 years Pension Credit (if worked on/after Jan 1, 1997).
**Age 55** with 10 years credit (if no work after 1996).
column3:
**Age 55** with 5 years Pension Credit (if worked on/after Jan 1, 1997).
**Age 55** with 10 years credit (if no work after 1996).
column4:
**Age 62** with 10 years Vesting Service.
**Oakland Plan Legacy:** Age 55 with 10 years Vesting Service.
column5: **Age 55** with 10 years service (or 5 years if worked on/after June 1, 1996).
column6: **Age 62** with 10 years of Vested Pension Credit.

column2:
**Age 60-62:** Reduced 0.75% per month.
**Age 55-60:** Reduced additional 0.50% per month.
column3:
**Standard:** Reduced by specific tabular factors.
**Rehabilitation Plan:** New factors apply to terminated vested participants (e.g., at age 60, receive 60% of benefit vs 90% prior).
column4:
**Standard:** Reduced 0.6% per month younger than 65.
**Oakland Plan Legacy:** Reduced 0.5% per month younger than NRA.
column5: Reduced 0.5% per month for each month preceding Normal Retirement Date.
column6: Reduced 0.5% per month for each month preceding Normal Retirement Date.

column2: Based on total hours worked per year multiplied by a dollar factor (e.g., 2000+ hours = $37.83/month). Includes a 10% increase for active participants (2017).
column3:
**Before June 2010:** Percentage of contributions (e.g., 3.3% - 4.1%).
**After June 2010:** 1% of contributions.
**Rehabilitation Plan:** Surcharges do not accrue benefits.
column4:
Complex tier system based on employer contribution rates ("Window Benefits").
**Regular:** $18.80 - $25.00 per credit year.
**Windows:** $30, $35, $40, $45, or $50 per credit year depending on retirement date and employer "Level".
column5:
**1983-2007:** 3.33% of contributions.
**2008-April 2019:** 1.30% of contributions.
**May 2019+:** Percentage varies based on Plan Funded Percentage (0.50% to 1.60%).
column6:
**Past Service:** $1.78 x years.
**Future Service:** Percentage of contributions (varies by year, e.g., 5.7%, 4.55%, 2.0%).

column2:
**Eligibility:** 5 years credit + Total/Permanent Disability.
**Benefit:** Calculated as Regular Pension.
column3:
**Eligibility:** 10 years service (1 year future service).
**Rehabilitation Plan:** Eliminated for retirement age 55+; reduced to actuarial equivalent of age 55 benefit for those under 55.
column4:
**Eligibility:** 15 years Vesting Service + Total Disability + Age 55.
**Benefit:** Same calculation as Normal Pension.
column5:
**Eligibility:** 10 years service (or 5 years after 1996) + 5,000 lifetime hours + Social Security Award.
**Benefit:** Normal Pension amount (no reduction).
column6: **None.** This Plan does not provide a Disability Benefit.

column2:
**Break:** Less than 300 hours in a year.
**Permanent:** If consecutive break years equal prior service years.
column3:
**Break:** Less than 400 hours in a year.
**Permanent:** 5 consecutive one-year breaks (for non-vested).
column4:
**Break:** Less than 4 months vesting service or 500 hours.
**Permanent:** 5 consecutive one-year breaks (or equals prior service).
column5:
**Break:** Less than 300 hours in a Plan Year (post-1996).
**Permanent:** 5 consecutive breaks or equals prior service.
column6:
**Break:** Less than 500 hours.
**Permanent:** 5 consecutive one-year breaks.

column2: **Hours Restoration:** 2020 hours automatically increased to match 2019 hours to prevent breaks in service/credit loss.
column5: **Vesting:** Participants active as of April 1, 2020 receive 1 Year Vesting Service for Plan Year ending March 31, 2021 regardless of hours.
column6: **Claims:** Deadlines for claims/appeals tolled during "Outbreak Period" (March 1, 2020 + 60 days after end of emergency).

column2: 50% Joint and Survivor Annuity with Pop-Up.
column3: 50% Joint and Survivor Annuity with Pop-Up.
Modified Life Annuity (no 36-month guarantee under Rehab Plan); 75% J&S.
column4: 75% Qualified Optional Survivor Annuity; Lump Sum if value <$5,000.
column5: 75% Qualified Joint and Survivor Annuity; Life Annuity w/ 3-Year Guarantee; Lump Sum if value <$5,000.
column6: 75% Joint and Survivor Annuity; Lump Sum if value ≤$5,000.

column3:
**Single:** 36x monthly benefit (Eliminated by Rehab Plan).
**Married:** 50% J&S.
column5:
**Single:** Lump sum of contributions (max $5,000).
**Married:** 50% QPSA or unmarried benefit.

column2:
**Under 62:** Suspended if working 40+ hours/month in Covered Employment.
**Over 62:** Monthly benefit not increased for work >40 hours/month.
column3:
**Under 62:** Suspended if 40+ hours/month in Industry.
**62-65:** Suspended if 40+ hours/month AND >1,000 hours/year.
**Over 65:** No suspension.
column4:
**Under 65:** Suspended if working in Covered Employment.
**Over 65:** Benefits offset by actuarial value of in-service distributions.
column5:
**Before NRA:** Suspended if re-employed in Industry.
**After NRA:** Benefit reduced by actuarial equivalent of payments received.
column6:
**Before 65:** Suspended if returned to Industry Work.
**After 65:** No suspension mentioned, but offset rules apply for overpayments.

column5: Age 72 (or 70 ½ if reached prior to Dec 31, 2019).
column6: Updated to **Age 72** (for those reaching 70 ½ after Jan 1, 2020).
